text: Then Peter reacted and said to Jesus, “Lord, it is good for us to be here; if you wish, let usInstead of “let us”, perhaps 0.5% of the Greek manuscripts, of objectively inferior quality, have “I will” (as in NIV, NASB, LB, TEV, etc.). make three booths: one for you, one for Moses and one for Elijah.”So how did Peter know who they were? Photography had not yet been invented. Luke 9:37 makes clear that they spent the night on the mountain. Evidently what has been recorded here (and in Mark and Luke) gives but a thumbnail sketch of all that took place.
